faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to your questions.

orders_shipping.question: How can I place an order?
orders_shipping.answer: You can place an order directly on our website by selecting the products and proceeding with checkout.

orders_shipping.question: Do I need to create an account to place an order?
orders_shipping.answer: No, you can order as a guest, but creating an account allows you to track your orders and save your shipping details.

orders_shipping.question: Can I modify my order after confirming it?
orders_shipping.answer: You can modify your order within 30 minutes after payment. Contact support for assistance.

orders_shipping.question: Can I cancel my order?
orders_shipping.answer: Yes, you can cancel the order before it is shipped. After shipment, you will need to request a return.

orders_shipping.question: How can I check my order status?
orders_shipping.answer: You can check your order status in the 'My Orders' section of your profile.

orders_shipping.question: How can I track my order?
orders_shipping.answer: After shipping, you will receive an email with a tracking link to follow your package.

orders_shipping.question: What does 'Processing' status mean?
orders_shipping.answer: It means that we are preparing your order for shipment.

orders_shipping.question: What are the shipping times?
orders_shipping.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days, while express shipping delivers within 24/48 hours.

orders_shipping.question: What are the shipping costs?
orders_shipping.answer: Shipping costs depend on your location and the chosen shipping method. You will see them before completing the order.

orders_shipping.question: Do you offer free shipping?
orders_shipping.answer: Yes, shipping is free for orders over €50.

orders_shipping.question: Do you ship internationally?
orders_shipping.answer: Yes, we ship to various countries. Shipping times and costs vary depending on the destination.

orders_shipping.question: Can I choose the shipping courier?
orders_shipping.answer: We work with multiple couriers, but it is not possible to select a specific one.

orders_shipping.question: What happens if I'm not home at the time of delivery?
orders_shipping.answer: The courier will attempt another delivery or leave a notice for pickup at a collection point.

orders_shipping.question: How can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
orders_shipping.answer: Contact support as soon as possible to check if it is still possible to modify the address.

orders_shipping.question: What should I do if my order arrives damaged?
orders_shipping.answer: If the package is damaged, contact us with photos of the damage to arrange a replacement or refund.

orders_shipping.question: What should I do if my order is delayed?
orders_shipping.answer: You can check the shipping status with the tracking code or contact our support team.

orders_shipping.question: What happens if my order gets lost?
orders_shipping.answer: If your package is lost, contact us and we will open an investigation with the courier.

orders_shipping.question: What does 'Preparing' status mean?
orders_shipping.answer: It means that your order has been received, and the products are being packed.

orders_shipping.question: How can I change my payment method after placing an order?
orders_shipping.answer: Once the order is completed, it is not possible to change the payment method.

orders_shipping.question: Do you accept phone orders?
orders_shipping.answer: Currently, we only accept orders placed through our website.

orders_shipping.question: Can I order multiple items with different delivery dates?
orders_shipping.answer: Yes, but items may be shipped separately based on availability.

orders_shipping.question: What should I do if I receive the wrong product?
orders_shipping.answer: Contact us, and we will arrange a replacement or a refund.

orders_shipping.question: Do you offer in-store pickup?
orders_shipping.answer: Currently, we only offer home delivery.

orders_shipping.question: What should I do if I entered the wrong address?
orders_shipping.answer: Contact our support team as soon as possible to correct it before shipment.

orders_shipping.question: Do shipping times include weekends?
orders_shipping.answer: No, shipping times refer to business days.

orders_shipping.question: What packaging options are available for my orders?
orders_shipping.answer: We use secure and eco-friendly packaging to protect your purchases.

orders_shipping.question: Can I request a gift package?
orders_shipping.answer: Yes, we offer a gift wrapping option at checkout.

orders_shipping.question: What happens if my order is rejected at delivery?
orders_shipping.answer: If the package is refused, it will be returned to our warehouse, and you may request a refund.

orders_shipping.question: How can I know if a product is available?
orders_shipping.answer: The availability of a product is indicated directly on the product page.

orders_shipping.question: Why was my order automatically canceled?
orders_shipping.answer: If the payment is not completed, the order may be automatically canceled.

orders_shipping.question: Can I schedule delivery for a specific day?
orders_shipping.answer: Currently, we do not offer the option to select a precise delivery date.

orders_shipping.question: What happens if my package is held at customs?
orders_shipping.answer: Additional documents or customs duties may be required.

orders_shipping.question: My package was marked as delivered, but I haven't received it. What should I do?
orders_shipping.answer: Check with your neighbors or building concierge. If you cannot find it, contact us for an investigation.

shipping_methods.question: What are the shipping times?
shipping_methods.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days, while express shipping delivers within 24/48 hours.

shipping_methods.question: What are the shipping costs?
shipping_methods.answer: Shipping costs vary based on the destination and method chosen. The exact cost is calculated at checkout.

shipping_methods.question: Do you offer free shipping?
shipping_methods.answer: Yes, we offer free shipping for orders over €50.

shipping_methods.question: Which couriers do you use for shipping?
shipping_methods.answer: We use various couriers such as DHL, UPS, and Poste Italiane to ensure fast and safe deliveries.

shipping_methods.question: Can I choose the courier for my shipment?
shipping_methods.answer: No, the courier is automatically selected based on the destination and shipping method.

shipping_methods.question: Do you offer international shipping?
shipping_methods.answer: Yes, we ship to multiple countries. Shipping times and costs vary depending on the destination.

shipping_methods.question: How can I track my shipment?
shipping_methods.answer: You will receive an email with a tracking link as soon as the package is shipped.

shipping_methods.question: What happens if I’m not home at the time of delivery?
shipping_methods.answer: The courier will attempt another delivery or leave a notice for pickup at a collection point.

shipping_methods.question: Can I pick up my order at a collection point?
shipping_methods.answer: Yes, some couriers offer the option to pick up the package at a designated point.

shipping_methods.question: Does shipping include insurance?
shipping_methods.answer: Yes, all orders are covered by insurance in case of loss or damage.

payments_billing.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payments_billing.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, PayPal, Klarna, and bank transfers.

payments_billing.question: Can I pay on delivery?
payments_billing.answer: Currently, we do not offer cash on delivery for security reasons.

payments_billing.question: How can I use a discount code?
payments_billing.answer: You can enter your discount code on the checkout page before completing your purchase.

payments_billing.question: Are payments on your site secure?
payments_billing.answer: Yes, we use SSL encryption and advanced security protocols to protect your data.

payments_billing.question: Why was my payment declined?
payments_billing.answer: Your payment may be declined due to insufficient funds, incorrect details, or bank restrictions.

payments_billing.question: Can I save my payment details for future purchases?
payments_billing.answer: Yes, you can choose to save your card details to speed up future purchases.

payments_billing.question: What happens if I am charged twice?
payments_billing.answer: If you notice a duplicate charge, contact our support team for an immediate refund.

payments_billing.question: Can I pay with Apple Pay or Google Pay?
payments_billing.answer: Yes, we accept Apple Pay and Google Pay as payment methods.

payments_billing.question: Can I pay in installments?
payments_billing.answer: Yes, we offer installment payments through Klarna and other financing options.

payments_billing.question: Will I receive an invoice for my purchase?
payments_billing.answer: Yes, the invoice is sent via email immediately after order completion.

product_info.question: Are your products suitable for all animals?
product_info.answer: Each product is designed for a specific type of animal. Check the description for more details.

product_info.question: Are your pet foods natural and additive-free?
product_info.answer: Yes, we offer only high-quality products made with natural ingredients and no artificial preservatives.

product_info.question: Are your products tested on animals?
product_info.answer: No, our products are cruelty-free and not tested on animals.

product_info.question: Are the materials in your pet toys safe?
product_info.answer: Yes, we use non-toxic materials that are free from harmful substances to ensure pet safety.

product_info.question: Do your products have quality certifications?
product_info.answer: Yes, all our products meet European and international quality and safety standards.

product_info.question: Are your products biodegradable or eco-friendly?
product_info.answer: Yes, we offer a line of eco-friendly products made from biodegradable or recycled materials.

product_info.question: How can I check if a product is available?
product_info.answer: Product availability is shown on the product page. If out of stock, you can enable restock notifications.

product_info.question: Do you offer gluten-free or hypoallergenic pet foods?
product_info.answer: Yes, we have a selection of gluten-free and hypoallergenic foods for pets with special needs.

product_info.question: Can I see customer reviews before purchasing?
product_info.answer: Yes, you can read customer reviews on each product page.

product_info.question: Do you offer a warranty on your products?
product_info.answer: Yes, most of our products come with a 12-month warranty. Check the product page for details.
